TopicTitle: I WOULD LIKE YOU TO FIX THIS PROBLEM

Articles.Content:
To Whom may Concern

I had been doing Korean subbed localization  since the patch, and the problem is that whenever I apply KO in the build file and initiate the localized file, there's ingame problem of all pannels of Astronaut Complex becoming a blank. I had expected it to be fixed after several patches,  however ive noticed that it hasnt been. Although theres no problem with Korean Sub in other parts except the complex, the  problem hasn't been changed for a long time.
So i would like ask if you can deal with this problem

 

The following screen shot below shows the current problem that we are having now

 

Thank you

Edited March 14, 2018 by Shockrex

This would be a problem for the mod maker, since Squad simply doesn't have the staff power which would be required to make the stock game compatible with all mods. And so, the thread has been moved to modded support.
